oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Canister shot
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A piece of canister found in Northern Kentucky, along the path of Confederate General John Hunt Morgan's Raid. A complete round of canister consisted of multiple small iron balls packed in sawdust inside of a tin canister. When fired from a cannon, the tin canister split away and the balls dispersed much like shot from a shotgun.
